About Me

BIO

Hello, my name is Georgii! I am a creative person with open mind and artistic point of view. I got many vital web skills in personal life (As for me, coding is hobby), so lack of experience I compensate with self- education which my ego force me to do often. Setting up, creating, maintaining and participating is a passion which I need to fulfill on regular bases. I am looking for a nice place to work with cohesion team of developers, who are also crazy about web technologies as I am.
